name: Unite
description:
Hand in hand, the morning rises.

All proceeds from this piece are directed to KT1DWnLiUkNtAQDErXxudFEH63JC6mqg3HEx, a contract that has been set up by Versum and fxhash in order to collect funds to support relief efforts in Ukraine.

Process: A Sony KV-13FM12, Sony HVC-2400, Sony XV-5000, Panasonic AG-MX70P, Panasonic WJ-MX50A, Panasonic WJ-MX30, ADC V-300X, Akai PS-V20U, Victor JX-C7, Sony XV-C900, Videonics VE-1A and ADC V-300 dreaming of each other, through each other. Final output stabilized and enhanced via For.A FA-370

Direct capture via Canopus ADVC-110, edited in Adobe Premiere Pro, stabilized via For.A FA-370, played back through a Sony KV-13FM12, and rescanned via Nikon D7100 donning an Asahi Super-Multi-Coated Macro-Takumar 1:4/50, interfaced direct to computer via HDMI to Blackmagic Design UltraStudio Recorder 3G and OBS Studio.

Footage edited in Adobe Premiere Pro, then composed, colour graded and rendered in Adobe After Effects and converted with HandBrake.
